query:
UPDATE tourist_sites 
SET 
  description = 'The white castle overlooking the Danube River with panoramic views of Austria and Hungary. Beautiful baroque gardens behind the castle with free entrance.',
  openingHours = 'Daily: 09:00-18:00',
  plannedVisitTime = '09:30',
  updatedAt = NOW()
WHERE tripId = 30001 AND name = 'Bratislava Castle';

UPDATE tourist_sites 
SET 
  description = 'The only remaining gate from medieval city walls. Heart of the historic center with charming streets. Pass by Čumil (Man at Work statue).',
  openingHours = 'Open 24/7',
  plannedVisitTime = '11:30',
  updatedAt = NOW()
WHERE tripId = 30001 AND name LIKE '%Old Town%';

UPDATE tourist_sites 
SET 
  description = 'Art Nouveau church that looks like a blue fairy tale. One of the most photogenic buildings in Bratislava. 7-10 minutes walk to Eurovea mall.',
  openingHours = 'Mon-Sat: 07:00-19:30, Sun: 07:30-12:00, 17:30-19:30',
  plannedVisitTime = '15:00',
  updatedAt = NOW()
WHERE tripId = 30001 AND name LIKE '%Blue Church%';

UPDATE tourist_sites 
SET 
  description = 'Modern shopping mall on the Danube riverfront. Large Primark store on floors 0 and 1. Air-conditioned and comfortable for walking.',
  openingHours = 'Daily: 09:00-21:00',
  plannedVisitTime = '15:30',
  updatedAt = NOW()
WHERE tripId = 30001 AND name LIKE '%Eurovea%';
command:
